overview:
Pat co-founded StayClassy in 2006 and has led the company’s business development and marketing initiatives. Pat is focused on StayClassy’s strategic growth - building charity relationships, business partnerships, and growing the organization’s internet presence across the US.

Recently Pat was appointed to one of San Diego’s largest Business Improvement District’s Board of Directors. Prior to StayClassy, Pat worked for General Dynamics Corporation as the Deputy Program Manager of the largest commercial shipbuilding contract in the United States, with previous positions in Operations and Strategic Business Development. Pat holds a Bachelor of Science degree in Mechanical Engineering with a minor focus in Economics from the University of Massachusetts at Amherst.
